pageContent: Background: Radiotherapy is a treatment option in the case of local failure following treatment for localised prostate cancer with high-intensity focussed ultrasound (HIFU).

metaData.source:
Prostate Ablation Using High Intensity Focused Ultrasound: A Literature Review of the Potential Role for Patient Preference Information
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29702099/
